meanings.definition: A book of rules for card games.
meanings.sent1: I always keep my hoyle handy when playing card games.
meanings.sent2: The hoyle helped us settle the dispute about the rules of the game.
meanings.sent3: My hoyle is like a secret weapon for winning at card games.
meanings.sent4: Her hoyle was a treasure trove of knowledge for all card enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The hoyle is like a map guiding us through the world of card games.

meanings.definition: A person who is skilled at card games.
meanings.sent1: My grandpa is a hoyle and always wins at card games.
meanings.sent2: She became a hoyle after years of practice and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The hoyle in our group never loses a game, it's almost magical.
meanings.sent4: He is a hoyle, turning every card game into a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent5: The hoyle's expertise in card games is truly impressive.
